casebody.data:
In re Z.C.M. and C.E.M. appealed by Respondent-Mother. No. 71P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina, June 27, 2007. Richard E. Jester, for Mother. Jamie Hamlet, for Alamance County DSS. Stuart A. Brock, Attorney Advocate, Charlotte, for Guardian ad Litem. Chris Watkins, for Father. Mildred Hardy, for Blantons.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 5th day of February 2007 by Respondent (Mother) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th day of June 2007."

HUDSON, J., recused.
